name: Vargr

physical.senses: Keen smell and hearing, average vision

body_language.showing_teeth: Can be friendly (grin) or threatening (snarl) - context dependent

social.loyalty: To individuals, not institutions - will follow a proven leader anywhere
social.pack_dynamics: Form tight bonds with trusted companions
social.outsider_relations: May seem fickle to humans due to different loyalty model

roleplay_notes: May challenge authority that hasn't proven itself
Deeply loyal once trust is established
Body language is important - describe ear/tail positions
Names often have sharp consonants (Kira, Gvurrdon, Kforuzeng)

walston_specific.occupations: Service roles, labor, some skilled trades
